title: Amazon API Gateway to AWS Lambda
description: Create an Amazon API Gateway to AWS Lambda REST API.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern in CDK offers a boilerlate to generate an Amazon API Gateway REST API endpoint with a a greedy proxy ('{proxy+}') and 'ANY' method from the specified path, meaning it will accept by default any method and any path. The lambda provided in TypeScript only returns the path.
